channel.title: Nginx on Zack McCauley - WardsParadox
channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on Zack McCauley - WardsParadox

item.title: Munki URL Redirector
item.description: Due to recent requests by staff who are struggling to find software in the Managed Software Center, I tried to find a way to send links to the users via email when they have requests. We use GSuite for Education, and Gmail will strip any links that have custom URL Schemes (like what Munki uses munki://) for security reasons.

item.title: Faster Munki Downloads from Nginx
item.description: Through multiple issues over the last month or so, I decided to completely rebuild my Munki server. This server is semi-critical in our district as all configurations are now sent out via Munki. As I was waiting for Ubuntu 16 to install and do some base configurations, I started looking for some guides on how to increase performance. I stumbled across worker_cpu_affinity.
